name: Accountability
description: Degree to which accountability is established for the system's actions, errors, and outcomes.

values.name: Full Accountability
values.description: Full accountability with mechanisms for redress, remediation, and independent oversight.

values.name: Accountability Framework
values.description: Clear accountability framework in place, with defined roles, responsibilities, and processes for addressing errors and disputes.

values.name: Some Responsibility
values.description: Some responsibility assigned to developers or operators, but no formal accountability framework.

values.name: None
values.description: No clear lines of accountability for system's actions or errors.
